title: Rings Whose Non-Invertible Elements are Weakly Nil-Clean
authors: Peter Danchev, Arash Javan, Omid Hasanzadeh, and Ahmad Moussavi
abstract:
In regard to our recent studies of rings with (strongly, weakly)
nil-clean-like properties, we explore in-depth both the structural and
characterization properties of those rings whose elements that are not units
are weakly nil-clean. Group rings of this sort are considered and described as
well.
